metadata.feature_description: Manages file metadata including title, description, tags, and system attributes like archive, hidden, read-only

steps.action: Navigate to Assets panel and select cavalier-logo.png file
steps.expected: File details panel opens showing metadata fields
steps.actual: File details panel opened with Name, Description, Title, Tags fields visible

steps.action: Enter 'Company Logo Image' in the Title field
steps.actual: Title field successfully updated with 'Company Logo Image'

steps.action: Enter description text in the Description field
steps.expected: Description field accepts multi-line text input
steps.actual: Description field updated with 'This is the official Cavalier Corporation company logo used for branding purposes.'

steps.action: Click on Tags field and type 'logo', press Enter
steps.expected: Tag 'logo' is added to the file
steps.actual: Tag 'logo' was added and displayed as a tag chip with remove button

steps.action: Type 'branding' and press Enter to add second tag
steps.actual: Tag 'branding' was added successfully, both tags displayed

steps.action: Click the remove (X) button on the 'branding' tag
steps.actual: Tag 'branding' was successfully removed, only 'logo' tag remains

steps.action: Verify Archive attribute toggle is visible and functional
steps.expected: Archive toggle can be turned on/off
steps.actual: Archive toggle was already On (checked) by default and displayed correctly

steps.action: Toggle Hidden attribute from Off to On
steps.actual: Hidden attribute successfully changed from Off to On

steps.action: Toggle Read-Only attribute from Off to On
steps.actual: Read-Only attribute successfully changed from Off to On

steps.action: Verify System attribute toggle is visible
steps.expected: System toggle is displayed and can be toggled
steps.actual: System attribute toggle displayed correctly, left in Off state for this test

steps.action: Toggle Publish Period from Off to On
steps.expected: Start Date and End Date fields appear
steps.actual: Publish Period toggled On, Start Date (2/9/2026) and End Date fields appeared

steps.action: Click Save button to save all metadata changes
steps.expected: Changes are saved and panel closes
steps.actual: Save completed successfully, details panel closed

steps.action: Re-open file details to verify saved metadata
steps.expected: All metadata values are persisted correctly
steps.actual: All metadata verified: Title='Company Logo Image', Description saved, Tag='logo', Archive=On, Hidden=On, Read-Only=On, System=Off, Publish Period=On with Start Date=2/9/2026

observations: The file attributes (Archive, Hidden, Read-Only, System) are only available for files stored in Standard folder mapping that supports file system attributes
Tags are implemented using DNN's taxonomy/term system and support autocomplete search functionality
The Publish Period feature allows setting a Start Date (defaults to current date) and optional End Date to control file availability
Description field has a maximum length of 500 characters as defined in the code (MaxDescriptionLength constant)
